item.title: Toward Upsidedown
item.description: … Page filling in progress… :) Official countdown to our “UpsideDown” adventure in Ozzy var myCountdown4 = new Countdown({ year: 2013, month:12, day:12, hour: 11, minute: 30, width:500, height:100, rangeHi:"month", rangeLo:"minute", style:"flip" }); The blog You can follow our (little) adventure at The not so loved and not so updated blog Our more updated Google+ page The trip The backpack Travelling Guides Lonely Planet Site Lonely planet guide Friends Tips&Tricks
